title: Georgia - Poverty rate 2000 to 2018
summary: Overall Percentage of population has increased over the Year.
Percentage of population is slightly increasing from 2000 to 2004, roughly constant from 2004 to 2008, and finally slightly increasing from 2008 to 2011.
The steepest increase occurs in between the Year 2008 and 2009.
The highest Percentage of population, of value 19.1 was reached at Year 2011
The lowest Percentage of population, of value 11.7 was reported at Year 2001
